 cvm_common_packet_copy
  • Makes a copy of the packet_buffer (including chained list of packet buffers)
  • allocates memory for packet_buffers

 cvm_common_swp_packet_copy
  • Makes a copy of the work_queue_entry and the packet_buffer (including chained list of packet buffers)
  • allocates memory for work_queue_entry
  • calls cvm_common_packet_copy

printf("packet_ptr u64 0x%016llx, i %d, back %d, pool %d, size %4d, addr 0x%08llx\n", \
            CAST64(packet_ptr->u64), \
            packet_ptr->s.i,     \
            packet_ptr->s.back,  \
            packet_ptr->s.pool,  \
            packet_ptr->s.size,  \
            CAST64(packet_ptr->s.addr)); \

int cvm_common_packet_copy (  cvmx_buf_ptr_t *  ptr_to,
cvmx_buf_ptr_t *  ptr_from,
int  num_bufs,
int  total_len
)  [inline]
 

cvm_common_packet_copy

  • Makes a copy of the packet_buffer (including chained list of packet buffers)
  • allocates memory for packet_buffers

Return value:

  • ( 0) - success
  • (-1) - failure (memory cannot be allocated)
    • frees all the allocated memory for packet buffers
    • sets ptr_to to NULL

void cvm_common_packet_ptr_dump (  cvm_common_wqe_t *  swp  ) 
 

cvm_common_packet_ptr_dump

  • Prints packet_ptr info (including chained list of packet_ptr) for given swp

Return value:

  • none

int  entry_size,
int  buf_count,
char *  pool_name
) 
 

int cvm_common_swp_packet_copy (  cvm_common_wqe_t **  swp_to_ptr,
cvm_common_wqe_t *  swp_from
) 
 

cvm_common_swp_packet_copy

  • Makes a copy of the work_queue_entry and the packet_buffer (including chained list of packet buffers)
  • allocates memory for work_queue_entry
  • calls cvm_common_packet_copy

Return value:

  • ( 0) - success
  • (-1) - failure (memory cannot be allocated)
    • frees the new work_queue_entry
    • sets swp_to to NULL
